verses.verse: And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H2416>old<s%>: these were the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah<s%>.

And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H7153>Kirjath<s%>â€“arba; the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>: and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn<s%> for <S%H8283>Sarah<s%>, and to weep for <S%H1058>her<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> and a <S%H8453>resident<s%> with <S%H5414>you<s%>: give me a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>buryingplace<s%> with <S%H6912>you<s%>, that I may bury my <S%H4191>dead<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, saying unto <S%H559>him<s%>,

Hear <S%H8085>us<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>: you are a <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> among <S%H8432>us<s%>: in the <S%H4005>choice<s%> of our <S%H6913>tombs<s%> <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead<s%>; <S%H3808>none<s%> of us shall <S%H3607>withhold<s%> from you his <S%H6913>tomb<s%>, but that you may <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself to the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, even to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>.

And he <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, If it <S%H3426>be<s%> your <S%H5315>mind<s%> that I should <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H4191>dead<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>; <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H6293>me<s%>, and entreat for me to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6714>Zohar<s%>,

That he may <S%H5414>give<s%> me the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%>, which he <S%H7097>has<s%>, which is in the end of his <S%H7704>field<s%>; for as <S%H4392>much<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> as it is <S%H4392>worth<s%> he shall give <S%H5414>it<s%> me for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>buryingplace<s%> among <S%H8432>you<s%>.

And <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>: and <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>, even of all that went <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3808>No<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, hear <S%H8085>me<s%>: the <S%H7704>field<s%> give <S%H5414>I<s%> <S%H4631>you<s%>, and the cave that is in <S%H5414>it<s%>, I give it <S%H5869>you<s%>; in the presence of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> I it <S%H6912>you<s%>: bury your <S%H4191>dead<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> bowed <S%H7812>down<s%> himself <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, But if you will give <S%H3863>it<s%>, I pray you, <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H5414>me<s%>: I will give you <S%H3701>money<s%> for the <S%H7704>field<s%>; <S%H3947>take<s%> it of <S%H6912>me<s%>, and I will bury my dead <S%H4191>there<s%>.
And <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, saying unto <S%H559>him<s%>,

My <S%H113>lord<s%>, <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H776>me<s%>: the land is worth <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; what is that <S%H996>between<s%> me and <S%H6912>you<s%>? bury therefore your <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> unto <S%H6085>Ephron<s%>; and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, which he had <S%H1696>named<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H5674>current<s%> money with the <S%H5503>merchant<s%>.

And the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%>, which was in <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%>, which was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>, the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> which was in <S%H6086>it<s%>, and all the trees that were in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, that were in all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, were made <S%H6965>sure<s%>

Unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%> for a <S%H4736>possession<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>, before all that went <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>: the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in <S%H6965>it<s%>, were made sure unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>buryingplace<s%> by the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>.
